roleset.name: bring about, complete, carry out
roleset.note: FULFILL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'fulfill' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from fulfill.01-v predicate notes)
FULFILLMENT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on fulfill.01, WN sense #2. No VNcls. (from fulfillment.01-n)

example.name: pretty straightforward
example.text: Some note that Sony might have saved itself some trouble by just hiring Mr. Guber and letting [Mr. Peters]-1 stay on *trace*-1 to fulfill the Warner contract.

example.name: ADJ, arg1
example.text: Is the " equality " issue " religious wish fulfilment " which flies in the face of biological and sociological " fact " ?
example.arg: which flies in the face of biological and sociological "fact"

example.name: both args
example.text: The newspaper did not elaborate on how the other parties postponed their fulfillment of obligations.

roleset.name: feeling satisfaction at achievement of desires
roleset.note: FULFILLMENT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on WN sense #1. No VNcls. (from fulfillment.02-n)

example.name: both args
example.text: Bramhall took time during the Clapton tour to discuss Welcome, his many ongoing creative projects, and his fulfillment at finally achieving validation and success as an artist.
example.arg: at finally achieving validation and success as an artist

example.name: fulfill oneself
example.text: Socrates fulfilled himself by attending to nothing except reason in everything he encountered.
example.arg: by attending to nothing except reason in everything he encountered
